newsitem.title: USA: Medaphis Corp restates quarterly results.
newsitem.headline: Medaphis Corp restates quarterly results.

text.p: Medaphis Corp on Monday said it restated its earnings for every quarter of 1996 to correct inaccurate recording of revenues, employee bonuses, acquisition costs and depreciation in its original statements.
The restatement only affected interperiod results and had no material effect on the company's cumulative year-end results, Medaphis said.
The company narrowed its losses in the quarters ended September 30 and December 31 but reduced net income in the quarters ended March 31 and June 30.
